boardgame.name: KLASK
КЛАСК
boardgame.description: The KLASK game board is shaped like a ball field with two deep holes functioning as goals in each end of the field. In the middle of the field, three white magnetic pieces serve as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;obstacles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; do NOT attract them to your own gaming piece! Your gaming piece is a black magnet. You control it by holding a large magnet under the board. This magnet is connected to a small magnet placed on the field. The purpose of the game is to push the small, red ball around on the field with your magnet/gaming piece, shoot the ball past the obstacles and your opponent and into the goal hole (Klask). It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s so much fun when your opponent suddenly is covered in white obstacles or you drop your gaming piece into the goal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; something which might happen if you get a little too eager!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Place the game board on a table between the two players. Place the three white magnetic pieces on the white fields on the board. Put two coins in each point slot next to the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;0_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. Each player has a black magnetic gaming piece in two parts. Place the short (thin) part on top of the board and the long (thick) part under the board in such a way, so the two parts _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;catch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; each other. Place the ball in the corner start field. Steer it with the black gaming pieces._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The youngest player starts the game. You score a point if:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The ball ends in your opponent's hole and stays in the hole._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Two or all of the three white magnetic pieces stick to your opponent's gaming piece._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The opponent accidentally pulls their gaming piece into their own goal hole._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; If the opponent loses their gaming piece._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each time you get a point, you must move your coin one point forward in the point slot. The player who first reaches the KLASK field wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During the game:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; If one of the white magnetic pieces sticks to a gaming piece, the game continues; if two of the white magnetic pieces stick to one gaming piece, the opponent gets one point._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; If the ball falls over the edges of the board, you must place the ball in the corner start field in the half from which the ball fell._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; If one or more white magnetic pieces fall over the edges of the board, the game continues._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Each time a player scores a point, you must put the white magnetic pieces back on the white fields on the board, and the player who did not score a point places the ball in their corner start field._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Played a couple times. In excellent condition. All components (including extra magnet, ball, storage bag and original box) are included Free USA shipping!

Played a couple of times. Great condition. Postage in Germany 7 Euro. Postage elsewhere in Europe 16 Euro. Wysyłka w Polsce około 15 zł. Pick up possible in Berlin. Odbiór możliwy po ówczesnym umówieniu w Zielonej Górze. Bank Transfer of course accepted as a payment method.
